    Methods in sprite with parameters of type Rectangle
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    Gambledorf.act(Rectangle[] borders)
    Makes Gambledorf do everything that he should do without any keys being pressed (such as fall to the ground) This involves: - applying forces to his velocities - applying his velocities to his position - checking for collisions
